speaker: Timm
title: AI Show | Ramping up your custom NLP tasks with Verseagility | Episode 30
description:
On this episode of the AI Show, Timm Walz joins Seth to talk about how ramping up your custom NLP tasks with Verseagility (https://verseagility.azurewebsites.net) will benefit your data science workflow. He'll show us how to use the toolkit in combination with Azure Machine Learning. Be sure to check it out!
